lines.text: pretty face, pretty hands, pretty movement, but hard to regulate when she get out of order.
He's gonna finish us off. I want to tell you guys that it's been a pleasure serving with you.
Shut up, you Earth colony nitwit. He's not going to finish us off. He just wanted to stun us - put us out of commission for a while.
If a jackass had both your brains, he'd be a very dumb jackass!

[Thor and Galaxina are making out when he sadly stops]
What's the matter?
Yes we can. They're in the catalogue too.
